long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ometalk is an extension for Ome.TV and other video chatting apps. It provides functionality for live-transcription while chatting as well as translation on demand.

- 44 languages in 60+ countries
- Live transcription powered by AI
- Read Russian, Chinese and more with built-in romanization
- Meet new people at any time
- Start speaking new languages immediately

❤️🌎🌍🌏
